Title: The Tower
Plot: Lorenzo orders Piero da Vinci to defend his estranged son in court. During a performance for visiting royalty, Leonardo surprises the corrupt judge. Back at his workshop, Leonardo is surprised by the Turk.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Ted Allpress, Hywel Morgan, Ian Pirie, Philip Arditti, Ross O'Hennessey, Celyn Jones, Lydia Leonard, Peter Guinness, Tim Faraday, Simon Paisley Day, Paul Westwood, Simon Armstrong, Joe Claflin, Christopher Elson, J
